job_description:
üöÄ Edge AI Intern ‚Äì Intelligence at the Edge | QpiAI

The Artificial Intelligence team at QpiAI is building the next frontier of AI-driven edge intelligence‚Äîpowering smart devices, real-time perception systems, and decentralized learning pipelines for industry-grade applications.

From Agentic AI to Computer Vision and model optimization for edge hardware, we are designing cutting-edge solutions to push AI inference beyond the cloud. If you‚Äôre excited by the idea of bringing Large Models to Tiny Devices, we want to hear from you.


üîç Who We‚Äôre Looking For

We‚Äôre hiring Edge AI Interns to work alongside our product and engineering teams. You will be contributing to:

Edge AI model optimization, quantization, and ONNX conversion
Edge deployment workflows (e.g., Android/Linux) using Docker and Kubernetes
Real-time inference for CV and NLP applications on resource-constrained devices
Prototyping and testing model performance across ARM/NPU/EdgeTPU platforms
Integrating with QpiAI Pro and Agent Hive pipelines for edge-to-cloud AI orchestration


üí° Ideal Candidate Traits

First principles thinker with a passion for AI at the edge
Strong problem-solving skills and curiosity for optimization trade-offs
Hands-on, self-motivated, and eager to experiment and iterate


‚úÖ Key Requirements

Solid Python skills with deep learning libraries (PyTorch, TensorFlow, ONNX, TorchVision, OpenCV)
Familiarity with model quantization, pruning, and export formats (TorchScript, ONNX)
Deep understanding of edge computing environments (e.g.,Jetson, ARM, Raspberry Pi)
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Linux terminal
Exposure to MLOps tools and model orchestration frameworks
Strong fundamentals in ML, DL, CNNs, and Transformer architectures
Understanding of Version Control Systems, Workflow Orchestration, CI/CD pipeline
Recent graduate or student in Computer Science, ECE, or AI-focused programs (IITs/NITs preferred)


üåü Bonus Skills (Good to Have)

Knowledge of low-level optimizations (TVM, TensorRT, TFLite, OpenVINO)
Familiarity with MQTT, MinIO, or similar edge communication protocols
Experience with edge inference on audio, video, or multi-modal datasets
Exposure to LangGraph, LangFlow, or multi-agent frameworks

Build MVP from scratch in 2 months. Work on real product launch. Final-year students or recent grads preferred.
Build MVP from scratch in 2 months. Work on real product launch.  India's Auto-Rickshaw | Ride-Hailing App for Tier 2 & Tier 3 Cities
experience_required: Final-year students or recent grads preferred

job_description: This would be a Full stack Data Scientist role. Very unique opportunity to contribute in core models and not just experimental models. This gives a chance to work directly with Founders having core experience in Data. Expectation from the person is that they will define the problem statement, fetch data, identify right models, build and deploy in production. Responsibilities: Analyze raw data: assessing quality, cleansing, structuring for downstream processing; Design accurate and scalable prediction algorithms; Collaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to production; Generate actionable insights for business improvements. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, etc.); Deep understanding of basic statistics (central tendency, distributions etc.); Deep understanding of predictive modeling, machine-learning, clustering and classification techniques, and algorithms; Fluency in Python (it's fine if you take help of LLMs); Familiarity with MongoDB.
